summary:
I am a goal getter that have not been  restricted to my main educational  qualification but thrived in any business venture that picked my interest hence I described myself as Investor, Entrepreneur and Facilitator. 

Creativity is my strongest point, for this reason technology supplies captured my interest with deep passion that it became my first set up company. It gave me that ability to make conventional technology unconventional (obsolete or contemporary). 

The first ever Interactive touch screen installed in MTN Nigeria both at Aromire(Reception) and The Plaza HR department was installed by H3oMT in 2011 and 2012 respectively when this technology was relatively new to the world. This was my initiative which I proposed to the organisation and I was offered a proof of concept purchase order due to the fact that no one within the organisation had seen such except in science fiction films. Thus I funded it myself and was reimburse when it was installed and functioning properly as they envisaged. This depicts our role as a pioneer in technological innovation.

We have gone on to supply innovative technological corporate gift to big organisations around African continent; 
LG  Kenya
Dulux Nigeria 
NIC Bank Kenya 
CBA Bank Kenya 
Liquid Telecom UK
Liquid Telecom Kenya 
Chase Bank Kenya 
Etisalat Nigeria just to mention few. 

We live in an ever evolving world and H3omt has come to realise that a company can also generate passive income by investing in other business sectors infusing our technological means to enhance productivity. We are currently working with few companies in the following business sectors; 
Agribusiness
Real Estate
Business Consulting Services
Logistics Services. 

We also invest in other companies that aligns our interest and add value to our business, investors and service users. Our investment capacity are in any of the three categories which generally are:
Minority passive (less than 20% ownership)
Minority active (20%-50% ownership)
Controlling interest (over 50% ownership)

The above exhibits the description of myself as an Investor, Entrepreneur and a  Facilitator.

projects.description:
H3o Media Tech Supplied MTN Nigeria Bespoke Corporate Gift Items.

Introduction of bespoke technology gadgets into corporate gift items by infusing portable devices with cutting edge technology into the corporate/promotional gift items. 

We pick the right gift item with the right packaging that is tailored specifically to suit their targeted individual/group of clients.

Because we offer OEM gift Items, It gives our client the advantage of customisation that is restricted only to them. 

H3o Technology supplied MTN Nigeria with the following gadgets:

.Bespoke wireless travel speaker (with customised voice prompt)
.Bespoke Power bank 
.Bespoke Flexible Hug Light
.Bespoke Cerutti Gift Set.
.Bespoke Cerutti Fountain and Ball Point Pen.

https://www.facebook.com/pages/Chastos-H3o-Technology/275169796025188

projects.title: Installation of Interactive Touch screen MTN Nigeria
projects.description:
H3o IR Touch Overlay  The IR technology takes full advantage of the specially developed Optical Sensing technology which enables it to maintain bright, high contrast picture quality, accuracy and sensitivity; providing for those greater demand applications. 

With the overlay, it provides excellent image clarity, not susceptible to scratching,  easy to manufacture and design into any current screen technologies. 

Once calibrated, it does not require any adjustment and any object can be used as a stylus; including a gloved finger.  It is a technology that can be applied over following environmental scenarios:
Training Room
Retail Hall e.g. banking halls, reception halls of corporate organisations etc.
Conference Room
Exhibition and Conference centre
Boardroom

With this innovative technology, it opens up new presentation opportunities during:
Conferences
Training and for educational whiteboard presentation
Marketing presentations
Video conferencing
Large multipurpose displays
Commercial advertisements
